title: when tanks oneshot more than assassins...
body: {{champion:31}} {{champion:3}}  at this point why play assassins for anything other than mobility and style kills?

replies.body: Galio's not even a tank at this point. He's building full AP.

he is intended to be an ap bruiser not a 8 oneshot shot mage though, remember msoki when they changed him putting so much power into saplings that he really didnt need to work for he was intended to be a sustain tank still with vision from his e but that took a long time to nerf. right now galio does more damage with 1 basic ability more than any assassin with a full rotation of abilities.
I agree. With that much AP someone is a mage.
Agreed tankky champs deal way too much dmg {{champion:6}} {{champion:240}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:3}}
